lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I think it's an easy way to contribute to the global community.  Something that can be very small to us can make a big difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Analysis, writing, strategy, client relations, business problem solving.

lenders.name: Robert F Campbell
lenders.loan_because: It enables me to help those who I know who are helping themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build wind farms

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: If you want to give a gift that can really change the world for the better, this is just one of those gifts...
lenders.occupational_info: Technology Industry

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a fair and just world where all people have equal opportunities. I don't believe in nationality - I envision one unified planet where we all work together and share resources. Simply because I was born in a wealthy nation should not give me more human rights than someone who was born in a lesser developed country.
lenders.occupational_info: I write reports that analyze the impact on the environment from specific development projects that impact the land, or the impacts of decisions that would change the way that governments manage their lands.

lenders.name: Nel
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teachers assistant

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Nothing changes until somebody does something.
lenders.occupational_info: I write short and long fiction stories.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I'm privileged to have resources that I can share. I'm thrilled with the fact that an entrepeneur can build a better life for themselves with a little help from me.
lenders.occupational_info: biotech drug development

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve there life regardless of age, race, gender.
lenders.occupational_info: We are so lucky to live in Canada and our  work is challenging and exciting, its great to help someone out. Cheers!!

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate

Ben: Cancer data system analyst, musician, and peace and civil/human rights activist's sidekick

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I've been doing a lot of reading and I've discovered that what the world's impoverished countries need is not just aid, but investment and a source of capital
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes loans to people in our country so that they could buy houses.

lenders.name: Jayson
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have many people in my life that have supported my dreams. Kiva is a small way I am able to give back to the dreamers of the world.

lenders.name: Edith Walsh
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like finding a business similar to my own

lenders.name: John and Julie
lenders.loan_because: A little from us can make a big difference for others.

lenders.name: Dag Jacobsen
lenders.loan_because: Its the very least I can do ....... I should be donating the money but atleast this way the cash stays in the lending loop as long as its repaid and thus reloaned again and again !
lenders.occupational_info:
Currently unemployed as far as income goes but living in a lucky part of the world I can still lend someone a bit. 

But I do a lot of computing stuff without  making any money on my skills .. Im also a big retro computing geek, with my main interest in the great Commodore 8bit/16bits C64 and Amiga...

Medically Im recovering from a neurological problem.. Lucky to live in Norway ..

lenders.name: chardon
lenders.loan_because: this seems to be a truly hands on type of service which allows people to really get involved in the process. with some other agencies, you wonder how much of your money actually gets to the people.
lenders.occupational_info: i work for a canadian national tv station. as a tv eng editor, i cut stories for our two and a half hours of local and international news. together with the reporter, we sit and put together reports that focus on everything from the Vancouver polar bear swim to last night's Canuck hockey game highlights to the Wille Pickton murder trial. i have been doing this work for 31 years.

lenders.name: Baron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software to enable mobile phone communications (e-mail/instant messaging/etc...).

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Thailand and visted many of the neighboring countries during my time there.  The people are so warm and generous that... Well let's just say I do it to lend a hand.

lenders.name: Marlon
lenders.loan_because: Lending rocks out loud!!!

lenders.name: Taeko and John
lenders.loan_because: we help each other.

lenders.name: Juergen
lenders.loan_because:
I wont do it anymore, borrowers pay 17-70% interest on the money you lend...  36% in average!! This is NO help, it is a crime! ...at least here in Germany

This is BULLSH**T

lenders.loan_because: I have seen how what I consider to be a small amount of money can change a life.

lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and would like to help other entrepreneurs do well.

lenders.occupational_info: Working with young people (students) to be their friends and help them to grow in the love of the Lord and to love one another.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the cycle of good will. Many people have helped me along in life and will continue to do so. I want to be able to pass on whatever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to live life to the fullest and to not have any regrets

lenders.name: Fiore Grandchildren

lenders.occupational_info: Grandma Fiore is a real estate Broker specializing in commercial owner/user and investment properties in Florida

Love you mom.

lenders.name: Gavin, Lisa & Katie

lenders.name: judith

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: In the 90's I started up a small import/export/distribution business working with artists in Bulgaria, Zimbabwe. Zambia, the UK and USA.  It was always a struggle as I did not have enough capital to grow the business and eventually I sold it (for not much money) in order to move onto something more sustainable.  I loan because I know what it is like to be full of potential and bursting with ideas, but underfunded.
lenders.occupational_info: I now work as a complementary therapist, assisting people in feeling healthier, more optimistic, relaxed and peaceful.  I find this to be very satisfying work and like to think I am helping to improve our world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it is about time we stand up and help others through this small gesture
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help business people achieve their personal and business goals faster that they've ever imagined.

lenders.occupational_info: I direct the gift shop, the ticket desk and the cafe at the art museum. We sell items, tickets and food to the visitors that come to see our exhibitions.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: GIVING IS THE BEST WAY TO RECEIVE
lenders.occupational_info: Service and repair of automobiles, converting hybrid cars to plug in hybrids

lenders.name: Beth M

lenders.name: One-Dress Project
lenders.loan_because: The One-Dress project makes these loans as we would like to assist women across the world in reaching their goals, dreams and full potential.
lenders.occupational_info:
The "One-Dress" has been collectively designed and created by over 1000 women from across the globe via online social 
networks such as Facebook, Myspace, ASmallWorld, Twitter, etc.

Over the course of eighteen months these women were asked to share information about their lifestyle, dreams and desires 
as relates to one simple - but truly important piece of clothing - the DRESS. By sharing their likes and dislikes in fabrics, 
colors, necklines, silhouettes, seasons, etc. the "One-Dress" was conceived, incubated and now released into the universe.

The success of  our partnership with Kiva.org is one of the best experiences we have had the pleasure of being involved with.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's a great investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with elderly and disabled people in support of them living in their own homes rather than in institutions.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in some small way. I read about Kiva and micro-lending and the discipline and dedication of the borrowers impressed me. It is particularly encouraging and enspiring that these entrepreneurs, who have so little means, are seeking loans, with the responsibility of paying back, not just charitable handouts. It is also amazing how what is a tiny amount of money for me can make such a huge difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in implementing next-generation communications technologies, many of which will enrich the lives of many people in even the most remote regions of the world.

lenders.name: Ed and Nancy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others in some small way, and Kiva provides a perfect opportunity.

lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to express themselves through art.

We moved many times.   He died 10 yrs. ago and I moved back to Ohio.  I re-met  a school mate and have now been married 5 yrs.  I love gardening, sketching, entertaining family and friends. I especially love being a grandma!

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I have been SO lucky: born into a rich and powerful country, never felt hungry, always have good doctors, go to the market or restaurant when I feel like it, or on a vacation when I want to. The awareness that I'm part of a practically-miniscule percentage of people who have these advantages in the world is why I keep coming back to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I interview writers and artists for the radio and publications.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach, write, and consult to educators and managers.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: To help another person

lenders.name: Carey  and Mike Madding

lenders.occupational_info: I help airlines fix their jet airplanes.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.occupation: I help people take care of their teeth.
lenders.loan_because: I believe that becoming economically independent is a long term solution for anyone and that these entrepreneurs just need that extra bit (like many of us have needed in the past) to get going!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high school and college students to find ways to give back to their communities through community service, advocacy, and fundraising activities.

lenders.name: Rev. Scott & Sharon Campbell
lenders.loan_because: To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with OUR GOD

lenders.name: AmyMac
lenders.loan_because: if I could visit each person in need and lend a helping hand in anyway, I would.  I guess this is the next best thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currenty home with my young children, but plan to go back to teaching within the next few years.

lenders.name: Lauren A. Peña
lenders.loan_because: We are called to love our neighbors as ourselves, and our global neighborhood is far-reaching.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be able to turn my talents and passion into a force for change. I'm studying to make a difference.

lenders.name: Minh Han, MD
lenders.loan_because:
I believe one person really can make a difference.  

I like using my medical knowledge to help people from around the world, but I know I can't go everywhere and do everything.  With Kiva, I can help people who I might never meet but deserve the chance to succeed in life.  

I came from a very poor family myself, and when my family fled Vietnam after the war, people helped us when we needed it.  Now it's my turn to help others in need.  Jesus said, "To whom much is given, much is required."  I feel like I have been greatly blessed, and I have an obligation to return that blessing by helping people less fortunate than I am.

I just love seeing the pictures and reading the stories of individuals from around the world who are working hard to make their lives and the lives of their loved ones better.  And it's a great way to learn about different countries and improve my knowledge of geography!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a family practice doctor, working with babies to old people, caring for their mental and physical health.  I work in two offices, go to the hospital, and see elderly patients in a nursing home.  I also serve as the high school doctor for Howell Cheney Technical High School and am on the board of directors for ProHealth Physicians, the organization I work under.

I also do medical mission work around the world when I get the chance.  See pictures on my website.

When not working (which is hardly ever) I enjoy the outdoors, gardening, environmental sustainability, saltwater reef keeping, and knitting.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of helping those who desperately want to improve their and their family's lives and, in the process, to improve their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach courses on health care policy, mental health and public health.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and it give me great pleasure to help other less fortunate small business owners become financially independant.
lenders.occupational_info: We help other business owners use the power of the internet to find more customers, and grow their business.
